info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:26PM EDT until July 12 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WORCESTER AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 626 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brimfield, or 19 miles east of Springfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 605 PM, amateur radio reported trees down in Longmeadow, MA. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Southbridge, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Sturbridge, Monson, Warren, North Brookfield, West Brookfield, Brimfield, Brookfield, Holland, East Brookfield and Wales. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
